sponsor: University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center
briefTitle: Pilot Trial of Deferasirox in the Treatment of Porphyria Cutanea Tarda
officialTitle: Pilot Trial of Deferasirox in the Treatment of Porphyria Cutanea Tarda
summary:
To determine the efficacy and tolerability of deferasirox in the treatment of Porphyria Cutanea Tarda.

Primary objective - the elimination of all blistering within 6 months of treatment.

Secondary objective - decrease in total body iron levels.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Showing Reduction or Elimination of Skin Blistering
